talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
Let's go through the Forest of Little Shadows and go to the Passage of Broken Recollections.
What are you waiting for?

$Geraint$
Let's go through the Forest of Little Shadows and go to the Passage of Broken Recollections.
What are you waiting for?

$Geraint$
Though much time has passed, the smell remains so clear.
(Go to the Passage of Broken Recollections through the Forest of Little Shadows)

$Geraint$
Though much time has passed, the smell remains so clear.
(Go to the Passage of Broken Recollections through the Forest of Little Shadows)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hmm... But the cave is too big for a human to live in.</html>
<html>A cave that's so hidden from view would be hard for people to find.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Hey this place... is reeking of dragon smell!! But this place is near where the humans live. Is this really where a dragon lived? And it almost looks like a shrine rather than a dragon's house, with too many books lying around... This is weird.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9563_qu_01.ogg}
Hmm... Oh there it is! Let me see…(Geraint opens the book and a splendid piece of artwork catches your eyes. Delicate brush strokes, dynamic movements of characters that almost seem to have a life of their own, and great shading technique... It's almost like the picture is breathing. It is signed off with Rubinart's name. Geraint asks seriously after seeing that.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>He's a great writer as well, based on what we've read so far….</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9563_qu_02.ogg}
He really drew this himself? It seems too real, like real humans fighting with a real dragon...
How can a dragon draw so well... Isn't it usually humans who are good at these things?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(She must have scolded the crap out of you...)</html>
<html>(Why did you steal Argenta's wine milk...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…He must have his own weakness!! Like... a bad sleeping habit! Maybe he wakes up to see his stinking feet resting on his pillow!! Or... sleepwalking and secretly drinking Argenta's wine milk!! And see the milk bottle fly around the house...!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(That's what a seventy-year-old would eat, not a seven-year-old kid!)</html>
<html>(So you like sweet and bitter stuff)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I had a sudden craving in the middle of the night, what could I do? That was the only time I tasted it. I like a healthier kind of sweetness... Like honeyed ginseng... Or ginger...

${user_nick}$
(I should talk to Geraint first)

${user_nick}$
(Geraint is busy thinking about his favourite food. Pull him to your side.)
Let's start reading the book again. This Rubinart dragon is really a diligent writer.
(Click on the book)

$Rubinart's Book$
My friend, you've always been curious how I came to build such a deep relationship with the humans when I used to live peacefully in the Ayrn Island all by myself for a long time. I was a little embarrassed to tell you about it last time, but I will tell you now.

$Rubinart's Book$
When I was just born, I caused destruction around the world because I didn't know anything. But as time passed, I found everything boring so I just stayed in Ayrn. But the humans kept bothering me after hearing tales about me. It looks like a mythical creature called a "dragon" made them really curious.

$Rubinart's Book$
I killed every single one that came. It's more irritating if you let them go back alive and they come back again. After killing the humans, I played with them, using them in experiments... But the Silver Dragon appeared one day and preached me about how I should try to trust the humans... So I followed her advice, but... I was betrayed by the humans and was stuck in Ayrn once again. I'll elaborate more on this later.

$Rubinart's Book$
Anyway, when I thought to myself I should never trust a human again and that all humans must be killed, an interesting Elf and humans visited me.

$Rubinart's Book$
With reckless Meriendel leading them, Elizabeth and Feder followed behind...

*Cut scene will not be played if a party member is carrying out the previous step of the same quest.
*Cut scene will also not be played when the party members are carrying out other quests.

$Rubinart's Book$
You have no idea how stupefied I was! Gosh, such a human really existed in this world! Moreover, he was friends with an ELF! Anyway, Feder and I exchanged a few blows and soon realised that we were a good match for each other. Then suddenly Princess Elizabeth interfered.

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9563_qu_01.ogg}
Why don't you save the fighting for later? Feder has tons of state affairs to look after. We are only here to find Meriendel who had gone missing. Let's avoid unnecessary bloodshed, shall we?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_01.ogg}
Bloodshed? HAH! What nonsense are you spouting, you female human! Don't tell me you think I'll lose to this puny human. I can kill you with a flick of my finger.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_01.ogg}
It seems like you're the one who is spouting nonsense. Do you think I would stand around and watch you do that?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_02.ogg}
Whoa, that's the spirit. You freakin' smell like something I used to know. Hey... Are you from Lunascent?

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_02.ogg}
…!!!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_03.ogg}
Wahahaha! So I'm right! I heard Lunascent's days are almost over. I really didn't expect someone from there. So, are you here for revenge? Only now? That's REALLY quick, don't you think? Did you realise it now that I'm the one who caused the calamities of the Night of Flames, you foolish human?

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_03.ogg}
…What do you mean?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_04.ogg}
Eh…? Why are you asking? You smell like those rotten idiots of the palace…

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9563_qu_01.ogg}
Palace...? Feder, didn't you say you used to be a slave?

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_04.ogg}
…….

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_05.ogg}
Slaaaave? Are you crazy? Are your noses blocked? How can a slave smell like this!! He smells like he tasted all the luxury in this world!! Though he has a lot of rough smells mixed in but I'm sure this fella is from the palace! But why did you say he's a slave... Oh right, I see... (Rubinart raises a corner of his lips)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_06.ogg}
Did you lose in the power struggle? That damn tussle for power. It's no surprise to be sold off as a slave when you lose. It's normal for whole households to disappear overnight. But how can someone who smells like you lose the power struggle, I wonder...

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_05.ogg}
I'm...the descendant of the royal family that relinquished the throne when Lunascent suddenly started to fall.

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9563_qu_02.ogg}
Oh, I see.
(Elizabeth doesn't seem surprised at all)

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9563_qu_02.ogg}
….!! Royal family…? But… Feder you... Lunascent…?!
(Meriendel seems taken aback)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_07.ogg}
….Hmm I see. Well, I expected it. I guess you were a small kid when they were fighting for power. Come to think of it, I think I've seen those eyes... and red hair before... Humans change so quickly so I wasn't sure if I had seen correctly…

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_08.ogg}
Your name was… something that meant "a loser who rules the sky"…

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_06.ogg}
…Shut your mouth!!(Feder swings his sword at Rubinart without a warning and Rubinart easily dodges it)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_09.ogg}
Easy there….

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_07.ogg}
I threw that name away. That's not my name anymore!! You better keep that mouth shut! And who are you, how do you know all this! How can a dragon like you know about the royal family of Lunascent?!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_10.ogg}
…How can a dragon like me possibly know all this?
(Rubinart's eyes are beaming angrily)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_11.ogg}
…You damn humans….(The air around Rubinart turns fierce. It's almost like the ground will boil any time)

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_08.ogg}
…!!(Feder stands in front of Meriendel and Elizabeth to shield them)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_12.ogg}
That's always the case for you humans, taking all the credits for yourselves. Filthy creatures... so you think your prosperity and culture all sprouted from your tiny brains? No one ever bothers to know where it all first came from. If I tell you that I, a dragon, gave you something called "culture" to begin with, you'd be foaming at your mouth and deny it vehemently...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_13.ogg}
…You humans would have been nothing without me!! How dare you!! How dare you humans try to deny me and even try to kill me!! What? You'd gain eternal youth if you have the dragon's heart? HAVE YOU GONE NUTS! So this is how you repay my kindness? It was you humans who kept repeating it is the right thing to repay kindness!! So the royals are so special that the rule doesn't apply them?!?!

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9563_qu_03.ogg}
…!! You mean the reason why Lunascent flourished more than any other country was... because of your help? We never heard about you, Rubinart...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_14.ogg}
…Oh yeeeah? You don't know how hard they tried to hide me. I didn't really care but, after looking at my work transform into the work of a human I'd never even heard of, do you have any idea how I felt?? They crawled at my feet when they wanted to learn something from me, and after they've gained what they wanted, that's it! Humans change too easily, don't you think? And they even tried to kill me. What should I do? Huh? What should I have done? Tell me, Hea... I mean Feder.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_09.ogg}
…Don't tell me….

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_15.ogg}
…(Rubinart sneers) Lunascent suddenly started to fall...? What, natural disasters? Plague? It was none of those. It was just me who revealed myself and killed you irritating rodents. I destroyed everything I taught you, and destroyed your lives too! I think I wiped out more than half of the population... Yet no one even knew that I was behind it.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_16.ogg}
…Just how many thousand years did I waste on the stupid humans… Haha... (Rubinart's face becomes contorted)
I wasted my life on such foolish creatures who don't know gratitude… I shouldn't have listened to Ancient Dragon... My thousands of years have gone into waste….

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_17.ogg}
…As for what was left of Lunascent... I heard a knight completely annihilated it. Hah, serves them right. Those who are deficient of the sense of gratitude should be exterminated.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_10.ogg}
…So it was you. I heard red lightnings and flames burst wildly during those times but... I thought it was because the heaven was mad about the royal family's lack of virtue…

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_18.ogg}
…You guys tried to kill the heaven, of course the heaven was angry, you stupid fools. Haha... It's annoying to talk about the past. Damn. That's why I killed all the humans that came here. Gahh... I'm so irritated right now... I need something to vent my anger…

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_19.ogg}
…Well, shall I just go back to my true form and run wild like the past? Come to think of it, this world is still filled with humans who don't know anything about gratitude…(An eery atmosphere fills the area around Rubinart) This continent will soon be ruined anyway… Maybe I should act before it does...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9563_qu_03.ogg}
…N-no!!

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9563_qu_04.ogg}
Wait a minute. Please calm down, Rubinart!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_20.ogg}
…Why should I…? You humans didn't listen to me when I told you not to do certain things… Why should I listen to you now? I…... What?!

$Knight Feder$
(Feder quietly walks in front of Feder who's glowering with fury and… he casts his sword away and kneels before Rubinart)

$Archer Meriendel and Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_Marriendel_9563_qu.ogg}
…!!! Feder!!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_21.ogg}
…Hey, what are you doing…? Hea… I mean Feder. What are you up to?

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_11.ogg}
I'm apologising. The blood of Lunascent's royal family runs through my veins as well. I didn't know anyone who's related to me by blood could have made such a cruel and foolish mistake. Red Dragon Rubinart, I'm here to give you my sincere apologies... Please don't torment yourself with vengeance anymore.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_22.ogg}
…Why are you the one who's apologising? Of course, all of you irritate me, but... Weren't you just a five-year-old, or younger when it all happened? You didn't know anything, and you became a slave because of those idiots. Why are YOU apologising? Back off, you were last to die on my mind anyway.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_12.ogg}
No!! I must! That's a responsibility by blood. Even if the sin wasn't mine to begin with, I can't escape the responsibilities if someone who's related to me by blood has sinned. Besides, I... I have also sinned in my homeland.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_23.ogg}
…What…?

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_13.ogg}
The knight who rampaged the barely surviving Lunascent… was me. I am the knight who was blinded by revenge and killed all the remaining royal family as soon as I became a knight and gained strength.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_24.ogg}
…What…!!!

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_14.ogg}
You have no idea how I regreted for nights and days after that. For months, the screams of people dying tormented me in my dreams... I was cold-blooded to the extreme that it was hard to say it was the same me. When I realised that revenge was a dangerous thing, what was once my homeland had already turned into a stinking land piled with corpses.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_15.ogg}
No matter how much I regretted, I couldn't turn back time. Thanks to my fiancee, I could come back to my senses and start atoning for my sins. Lunascent no longer has the royal family now, just the people who love the country. I'm looking after them now and atoning in whatever way I can.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_16.ogg}
Oh Red Dragon, who stood at the beginning of humanity. The world you blame no longer exists. If there is anyone you want to blame, that would be me, the last surviving royal blood.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_25.ogg}
…!!!

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_17.ogg}
Kill me if you must take revenge. But spare the other humans.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_26.ogg}
…Stop spouting nonsense you fool!! Why are you trying to cover up for the faults of other humans?! I just find not only Lunascent, but all you humans despicable….!!

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_18.ogg}
That's because I'll be the king of this continent. The ruler of this continent cares for all beings and lead them. If there is anyone in this continent who bears discontent, I'm ready to be the first one to listen to it.

$Archer Meriendel and Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9563_qu_06.ogg}
…!!!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_27.ogg}
Wh-what the heck?! You fool... Think about it. If it wasn't for me, you wouldn't have become a slave! Why are you asking for my forgiveness?!

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_19.ogg}
No, that's a different matter. What made me a slave was not only you but all those who claimed that the royal family should take responsibility for what was happening to Lunascent. But I must ask for your forgiveness. Talking about the wrongs you did would only come after that.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_28.ogg}
….Wow what an idiot… Where did this come from… Seriously…!! This is what those scums should have done in the past! Why are you doing this now!! Why!!! (Rubinart takes a step backwards like he's stupefied)

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_20.ogg}
…I'm ready. Since I don't have any weapon on me right now, I'll wait for you to make the decision, Red Dragon.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_29.ogg}
Damn, really… Seriously, this is…!!!
(Rubinart backs away with his hands covering his face)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_30.ogg}
You're really really really an idiot...!! Do you think that would make my fury go away?! What's the use of it now!! Why!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_31.ogg}
It's too late, too late you stupid fools...
You're stupid... That's why you humans should have treated me well when you could... *Sob*

$Archer Meriendel and Princess Elizabeth$
(DId he just sob?!?!)

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_21.ogg}
(He seems surprised by the sudden change in Rubinart, but remains kneeled in front of him)
You're the one who'll decide how to punish me. But please don't forget that I'm asking for your forgiveness right now, my Red Dragon.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_32.ogg}
You idiot!! That wouldn't bring back the old me!!
*Sob*...Damn, why are these tears coming down... I've never cried in front of a human before. It's all because of you... Do you think I would trust you if you ask for my forgiveness? If you really want me to forgive you humans... Then take the responsibility for saying that.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_22.ogg}
What would be enough for you to trust me?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_33.ogg}
…I'll come with you and live in your castle. I'm going to see how you rule, like how I did in the old days.
Become a good king for this continent or whatever and try creating a fine country right under my nose! If you don't do a good job, I'll destroy it like Lunascent!!!

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9563_qu_23.ogg}
Oh merciful Red Dragon.
You can stand by and watch over us anytime. I will not disappoint you.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9563_qu_34.ogg}
Urgh, I don't like being called with fancy names. Just call me Rubinart.
(Though his eyes turned red, he seems to be smiling. It seems like he likes the arrangement...)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Lose all memory when born again?! Don't tell me...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Rubinart's Book$
Hahaha it's kinda funny when I think about it now. Anyway, this is how Feder and I first met. I ended up living in a cave near Feder's castle and... Oh right, I remember the conversation you and I had, my old friend. But you probably don't remember anything since we lose all our memory when we are born again.

$Rubinart's Book$
...I'll just write down about it too, just to be safe.
You're the only one I can count on now...
I'll put my next book at the first place, just in case you didn't find this... You'll see something that you didn't see before when you open the same book.

$Geraint$
Friend…? Why does he keep mentioning this friend? This Rubinart dragon is a little nuts.
(Geraint finds it strange. Talk to Geraint.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It is strange if we think it's strange…</html>
<html>You mean it's strange how he draws so well?</html>
<html>He's very much like a human but... why is that strange?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Hey, don't you think this Rubinart is weird?

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9563_qu_03.ogg}
No not that... Rubinart and Feder were enemies. Rubinart destroyed something that was precious to Feder, and Feder's relatives hurt Rubinart. Then the two of them are enemies, isn't it? Then why did they end up to be on good terms in the end?

${user_nick}$
Well that's because both of them understood each other's situation and forgave each other.
And rather than hating Feder, Rubinart probably hated the Lunascent people.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9563_qu_04.ogg}
Even if so, the things they lost wouldn't come back even if they became friends. Then how can they be on good terms?

${user_nick}$
(He keeps asking difficult stuff from just now. But since he is being so serious... Ah... I should answer him to the best of my knowledge! Geraint is still a kid so he should be curious about many things…!)

${user_nick}$
Erm well... Bad feelings are created when there is something that can't be forgiven, but by asking for forgiveness, such feelings disappear. Then you can go on and be friends and that would make it easier to solve the issue that caused the deterioration in the relationship in the first place... Besides, it would be easier to gain what you had lost...
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It was the best answer I could give...</html>
<html>I'm not old enough to teach anyone too...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9563_qu_05.ogg}
You're longwinded.

$Geraint$
I get it. Roughly.(Geraint shakes his head.)
Let's go and find the next book. So we just have to go back to the place where we found the first book?
(Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past and find the book)

journal.title: Dragon's Tears 1
journal.contents:
Talk to Geraint at the Passage of Broken Recollections.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Geraint)
journal.destination: To the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Quest has been added. Go to Passage of Broken Recollections.

journal.title: Dragon's Tears 2
journal.contents:
Read Rubinart's Book at the Passage of Broken Recollections.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Rubinart's Book)
journal.destination: Read Rubinart's Book at Passage of Broken Recollections

journal.title: Dragon's Tears 3
journal.contents:
You've seen Rubinart's memories.
It looks like he wasn't on good terms with Feder at first.
Finish reading Rubinart's Book.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Rubinart's Book)
journal.destination: Read Rubinart's Book at the Passage of Broken Recollections

journal.title: Dragon's Tears 4
journal.contents:
Rubinart had mixed feelings about Lunascent and humans, but he opened up after receiving a sincere apology from Feder.
However, Geraint seems to have doubts about this.
Talk to Geraint about what he feels.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Geraint)
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at the Passage of Broken Recollections
